00011 unsigned short Texture::getShort(FILE* infile) {
00012         char ic;
00013         unsigned short ip;
00014         ic = fgetc(infile);
00015         ip = ic;
00016         ic = fgetc(infile);
00017         ip |= ((unsigned short)ic << 8);
00018         return ip;
00019 }

00025 unsigned long Texture::getLong(FILE* infile) {
00026         char ic = 0;
00027         unsigned long ip = 0;
00028         unsigned char uc = ic;
00029         ic = fgetc(infile);
00030         uc = ic;
00031         ip = uc;
00032         ic = fgetc(infile);
00033         uc = ic;
00034         ip |= ((unsigned long)uc << 8);
00035         ic = fgetc(infile);
00036         uc = ic;
00037         ip |= ((unsigned long)uc << 16);
00038         ic = fgetc(infile);
00039         uc = ic;
00040         ip |= ((unsigned long)uc << 24);
00041         return ip;
00042 }

00057 int Texture::loadBMP(std::string filename) {
00058         FILE* infile = NULL;
00059         infile = fopen(filename.c_str(), "rb");
00060         if (!infile) {
00061                 printf("OH NO!\n");
00062                 return 0;
00063         }
00064 
00065         int k, row, col, numPadBytes, nBytesInRow;
00066         char ch1, ch2;
00067 
00068     //This next part reads in some header file information
00069         BMPHeader header;
00070         fread(&header, 14, 1, infile);
00071 
00072     //And this is where we get all of the info that we are actually interested in
00073     BMPInfoHeader infoHeader;
00074     fread(&infoHeader, 40, 1, infile);
00075 
00076         if(infoHeader.bitsPerPixel != 24) {
00077                 printf("Error, should be 24 bits\n");
00078                 fclose(infile);
00079                 return 0;
00080         }
00081 
00082         nBytesInRow = ((3 * infoHeader.nCols + 3)/4) * 4;
00083         numPadBytes = nBytesInRow - 3 * infoHeader.nCols;
00084         numRows = infoHeader.nRows;
00085         numCols = infoHeader.nCols;
00086         pixels = new texRGB[numRows * numCols];
00087 
00088     //Read data in to pixels
00089         long count = 0;
00090         char dum;
00091         for (row = 0; row < numRows; row++) {
00092                 for (col = 0; col < numCols; col++) {
00093                         char r,g,b;
00094                         b = fgetc(infile);
00095                         g = fgetc(infile);
00096                         r = fgetc(infile);
00097                         pixels[count].r = r;
00098                         pixels[count].g = g;
00099                         pixels[count].b = b;
00100                         count++;
00101                 }
00102                 for (k = 0; k < numPadBytes; k++) {
00103                         dum = fgetc(infile);
00104                 }
00105         }
00106         fclose(infile);
00107         return 1;
00108 }

00122 void Texture::setTexture(GLuint textureName) {
00123     name = textureName;
00124     glBindTexture(GL_TEXTURE_2D, textureName);
00125     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MAG_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00126     glTexParameteri(GL_TEXTURE_2D, GL_TEXTURE_MIN_FILTER, GL_NEAREST);
00127     glTexImage2D(GL_TEXTURE_2D, 0, GL_RGB, numCols, numRows, 0, GL_RGB, GL_UNSIGNED_BYTE, pixels);
00128 
00129     //Now that we've set the texture, we can actually delete pixels
00130     delete [] pixels;
00131 }

00139 void TextureManager::cleanUp() {
00140     TextureManager* instance = pinstance;
00141     for (std::map<std::string, Texture*>::iterator iter = instance->texMap.begin(); iter != instance->texMap.end(); iter++) {
00142         if (iter->second != NULL) {
00143             delete iter->second;
00144         }
00145     }
00146     instance->texMap.clear();
00147     instance->texNameMap.clear();
00148 }

00157 TextureManager* TextureManager::getInstance() {
00158     if (TextureManager::pinstance == NULL) {
00159         pinstance = new TextureManager;
00160     }
00161     return pinstance;
00162 }

00174 int TextureManager::loadBMP(std::string filename) {
00175     std::map<std::string, Texture*>::iterator toFind = texMap.find(filename);
00176     if (toFind != texMap.end()) {
00177         toFind->second->numUsers++;
00178         printf("Number of users increased: now %i\n", toFind->second->numUsers);
00179         return toFind->second->name;
00180     } else {
00181         Texture* newTexture = new Texture;
00182         newTexture->loadBMP(filename);
00183         newTexture->numUsers++;
00184         newTexture->filename = filename;
00185         glGenTextures(1, &(newTexture->name));
00186         newTexture->setTexture(newTexture->name);
00187 
00188         texMap[filename] = newTexture;
00189         texNameMap[newTexture->name] = newTexture;
00190 
00191         printf("Number of users set: now %i\n", newTexture->numUsers);
00192         return newTexture->name;
00193     }
00194 }
00195 
00206 void TextureManager::unLoadBMP(std::string filename) {
00207     std::map<std::string, Texture*>::iterator toFind = texMap.find(filename);
00208     if (toFind == texMap.end()) {
00209         return;
00210     } else {
00211         toFind->second->numUsers--;
00212         printf("Number of users decreased: now %i\n", toFind->second->numUsers);
00213         if (toFind->second->numUsers <= 0) {
00214             texNameMap.erase(toFind->second->name);
00215             delete toFind->second;
00216             texMap.erase(toFind);
00217             printf("Texture erased\n");
00218         }
00219     }
00220 }

00232 void TextureManager::unLoadBMP(int id) {
00233     std::map<int, Texture*>::iterator toFind = texNameMap.find(id);
00234     if (toFind == texNameMap.end()) {
00235         return;
00236     } else {
00237         toFind->second->numUsers--;
00238         printf("Number of users decreased: now %i\n", toFind->second->numUsers);
00239         if (toFind->second->numUsers <= 0) {
00240             texMap.erase(toFind->second->filename);
00241             delete toFind->second;
00242             texNameMap.erase(toFind);
00243             printf("Texture erased\n");
